item.description:
Dr. Paul will be in Manchester Monday Night hosting a Town Hall. Join us at the Executive Court Banquet Facility located at 1199 South Mammoth Rd.  Doors open at 7pm and the event kicks off at 7:30pm.

To show that private charity is preferable alternative to government "charity" we are conducting a food drive for the New Horizons for New Hampshire Soup Kitchen, Food Pantry & Shelters. The goal is to collect 1000lbs of food, so bring any non-perishable canned and dried foods to help out those in need. Food collection starts at 6pm.

As always also with your non-perishable goods bring undecided friends, family, and even random folks you meet (they can bring food too) so they can meet Dr. Paul and have their questions answered by the next President of the United States.

https://www.facebook.com/events/259760397410513/


There is also some door to door events going on this weekend as well. Tomorrow Leah will be running a door to door effort in Ward 2 in Manchester. You can meetup at 10am in Wagner Park, she will have lists, maps, scripts, and literature.

https://www.facebook.com/events/219339961474968/

Chris Wood is also leading a door to door in Merrimack as well. He will be meeting people at 11:30am at the Burger King off of exit 11 on the Everett Turnpike. If you can make it please contact him at (603)799-7966


Finally we are getting our 4x8 signs in during the next few days and we need locations. We are looking for high traffic areas on private property. If you know a good area let me know if you need a 1 or 2 sided sign.

--
Shaun Bowen
Ron Paul 2012
128 Hall St., Suite D
Concord, NH 03301
(603) 718-8817
shaunb@ronpaul2012.com
www.ronpaul2012.com
item.name: Ron Paul in Manchester Monday Night!
